amendment.description: Amendment allows child welfare agencies access to Federal crime information databases in order that fingerprint-based checks on individuals under consideration as foster or adoptive parents may be conducted.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 30 printed in the Congressional Record to insert a new section on page 54, striking line 10 and all that follows through line 19 on page 55 entitled "Sec. 503. Access to Federal Crime Information Databases by Child Welfare Agencies for Certain Purposes.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sensenbrenner amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
